metadata.name: Bored Trust Token
metadata.description:
This is the only token in this collection. It grants its owner the ability to claim the funds locked in the token contract once the release time is reached.

The funds can be claimed through the 'claim()' function, which transfers everything to the caller's address. The user can also check the time left until release using the 'getTimeUntilRelease()' function.

Happy birthday, G! Enjoy this little gift!
-Mex
